mapper.select: SELECT EDU002R.EMN, ECD002M.ORG_NM, ECD007M.LOW_CLS_NM, EDU001M.COURSE_NM, EDU001M.EDU_HOUR, EDU001M.REG_ST_DT, EDU001M.REG_ED_DT, EDU001M.EDU_ST_DT, EDU001M.EDU_ED_DT, EDU001M.EDU_COST, EDU001M.LOC, EDU001M.REFUND_YN, ECD003M.STEP_NM FROM TB_IEP_EDU001M EDU001M, TB_IEP_EDU002R EDU002R, TB_IEP_ECD002M ECD002M, TB_IEP_ECD007M ECD007M, TB_IEP_ECD003M ECD003M WHERE EDU001M.COURSE_CD = EDU002R.COURSE_CD AND EDU001M.ORG_CD = ECD002M.ORG_CD AND EDU001M.LOW_CLS_CD = ECD007M.LOW_CLS_CD AND EDU002R.STEP_CD IN ('30') AND EDU002R.STEP_CD = ECD003M.STEP_CD

SELECT EDU002R.EMN, ECD002M.ORG_NM, ECD007M.LOW_CLS_NM, EDU001M.COURSE_NM, EDU001M.EDU_HOUR, EDU001M.REG_ST_DT, EDU001M.REG_ED_DT, EDU001M.EDU_ST_DT, EDU001M.EDU_ED_DT, EDU001M.EDU_COST, EDU001M.LOC, EDU001M.REFUND_YN, EDU002R.STEP_CD FROM TB_IEP_EDU001M EDU001M, TB_IEP_EDU002R EDU002R, TB_IEP_ECD002M ECD002M, TB_IEP_ECD007M ECD007M WHERE EDU001M.COURSE_CD = EDU002R.COURSE_CD AND EDU001M.ORG_CD = ECD002M.ORG_CD AND EDU001M.LOW_CLS_CD = ECD007M.LOW_CLS_CD AND EMN IN (SELECT EMN FROM TB_IEP_EMP001M WHERE BLNG_BRCD in (SELECT DISTINCT BLNG_BRCD FROM TB_IEP_EMP001M WHERE EMN = #{emn})) AND EDU002R.STEP_CD in (SELECT CASE WHEN AUTH_CD = '03' THEN '10' WHEN AUTH_CD = '02' THEN '20' END FROM TB_IEP_EMP001M WHERE EMN = #{emn})
